Class POP3Server

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configurable, LogEnabled, POP3ServerMBean, org.apache.james.protocols.api.ProtocolServer, ServerMBean

    OioPOP3Server

    public class POP3Server
extends AbstractProtocolAsyncServer
implements POP3ServerMBean
    NIO POP3 Server which use Netty
